casebody.data:
ESTATE OF TIPTON
v.
HIGH POINT UNIVERSITY, et al. No. 247P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Laura E. Conner, Raleigh, for Tipton, Robert Eugene (Jr.) (The Estate of), et al. Mel J. Garofalo, Charlotte, for Karpovich, Jeffrey A.

J. Douglas Grimes, Charlotte.

C. Rob Wilson, Charlotte. John E. Spainhour, Asheville, for Qubein, Michael. Clint S. Morse, Greensboro, for Delta Sima Phi Fraternity, Inc. Walter C. Holton, Jr., for Jefferson, Marshall. Michael C. Osborne, for Delta Sima Phi Fraternity, Inc. Zachary Young. Douglas E. Fierberg, for Tipton, Robert Eugene (Jr.) (The Estate of), et al. Douglas C. Melcher, for Tipton, Robert Eugene (Jr.) (The Estate of), et al. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of July 2015 by Douglas E. Fierberg for Admission Pro Hac Vice: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015." MARTIN, C.J., recused.
